BugInstance.message: org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.postgresql.ddl.PostgreSQLAlterIndexStatement.setRenameIndex(IndexSegment) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into PostgreSQLAlterIndexStatement.renameIndex

org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.postgresql.ddl.PostgreSQLAlterViewStatement.setRenameView(SimpleTableSegment) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into PostgreSQLAlterViewStatement.renameView

org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.postgresql.ddl.PostgreSQLClusterStatement.setIndex(IndexSegment) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into PostgreSQLClusterStatement.index

org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.postgresql.ddl.PostgreSQLClusterStatement.setSimpleTable(SimpleTableSegment) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into PostgreSQLClusterStatement.simpleTable
org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.postgresql.dml.PostgreSQLCallStatement.getParameters() may expose internal representation by returning PostgreSQLCallStatement.parameters
org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.postgresql.dml.PostgreSQLCopyStatement.getColumns() may expose internal representation by returning PostgreSQLCopyStatement.columns

org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.postgresql.dml.PostgreSQLCopyStatement.setPrepareStatementQuery(PrepareStatementQuerySegment) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into PostgreSQLCopyStatement.prepareStatementQuery
org.apache.shardingsphere.sql.parser.statement.postgresql.tcl.PostgreSQLLockStatement.getTables() may expose internal representation by returning PostgreSQLLockStatement.tables
